NPC.name: LionGirl Marauder
NPC.description: The desert trekking feline towers some eight feet tall and with skin of darkest ebony. Yet the untamed mane of hair framing her face and spilling down her back is purest straw blonde, the fur of her feline ears and long tuft tipped tail almost match the tone of her hair with their bleached tan hue. Were she not fully clad in a pale Chlamys or mantle draped over her shoulders and a similar hued skirt you could tell if the carpet matches the drapes as it were. And if her size and predatorily assessing gaze wasn't enough of a menace then the fact she has a rifle in her hands and several bullet laden pockets on her belt.
